creditline: Bequest of Mrs. Constance Earle, in memory of her husband, Marion Eppley, Class of 1906
inscribed: Verso, in black, painted in imitation of a stencil with large leaf in center of inscription: "G. WASHINGTON" above leaf; below leaf, "by Ch. Willson Peale / 1795";
